title: Client Problem
body:
I cannot click the "play button" to launch a game or when one of my friends invites me to a game....it just say's loading and never actually lets me accept it to join the lobby. I also cannot laugh the legacy client even, too see if i can get into a game that way. Help. Please. :( 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like your connection to our servers could be hindered by some incompatible network settings. To be sure that yours aren't causing an issue, work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which covers the most common network misconfigurations that cause issues.

Let me know if this helped!
